sentence: Machine learning (ML) is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI) focused on the development of algorithms that allow computers to learn from and make decisions based on data. Unlike traditional programming, where rules and instructions are explicitly defined, machine learning models learn patterns, make predictions, or classify data without human intervention. This process begins with data — whether images, text, or numbers — which is used to train the model.
There are three main types of machine learning: supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning.
